backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing a Bitcoin credit transfer system with balance management, peer transfers, withdrawal requests, Bitcoin purchases, transaction history, reserve adjustments, access control, and HTTP outcalls for BTC price fetching.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features documented.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files including components, pages, hooks, and configuration files for the Bitcoin credit transfer application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes using OKLCH color space, defining design tokens for backgrounds, foregrounds, borders, charts, and sidebar components.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point with root div and module script reference to main.tsx for the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring TanStack Router with routes for dashboard, buy credits, buy BTC, send BTC, history, admin pages, withdrawals, peer transfers, and puzzle rewards, wrapped with QueryClient, ThemeProvider, and ProfileSetupModal.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminAccess: Full-screen error component displaying access denied message for non-admin users, showing their principal ID with copy functionality, session diagnostics (token detection, access control initialization), and retry/sign-out actions.
Loading screen component for admin access verification with animated spinner, elapsed time counter, masked principal display, and retry/sign-out actions appearing after 10 seconds.
Protected route wrapper component that checks admin status using useIsCallerAdmin hook and renders AdminAccessLoadingScreen during verification or AdminAccessDeniedScreen if unauthorized.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminTroubl: Displays a warning card for authenticated non-admin users, showing their principal ID with copy functionality and a retry button to re-check admin status.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoggedOutSi: Renders a centered sign-in panel for unauthenticated users with a button to initiate Internet Identity login.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button that handles Internet Identity authentication, clears query cache and admin status on logout, and manages authentication state.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog that prompts authenticated users without a profile to enter their name, blocking interaction until profile setup is complete.
frontend/src/components/balance/UsdEstim: Displays estimated USD value for a BTC amount based on current price, with loading state and disclaimer about market fluctuations.
frontend/src/components/buybtc/BuyBitcoi: Table component showing Bitcoin purchase history with transaction IDs, amounts, dates, and actions to copy txid or view on blockchain explorer.
frontend/src/components/buybtc/InstantFu: Form for recording Bitcoin purchases by entering transaction ID and amount, with validation, instant balance crediting, and success feedback.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Application header with title and login/logout button that manages Internet Identity authentication and clears query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main application layout component that renders the header, navigation menu with authenticated/admin routes (Dashboard, Buy BTC, Send BTC, Withdraw, History, Admin panels), and footer with attribution links.
frontend/src/components/reserve/AdminBro: Collapsible card component providing troubleshooting guidance for Bitcoin transaction broadcasting issues via Internet Computer HTTP outcalls, embedding a BestPracticesSection for common problems and solutions.
frontend/src/components/reserve/AdminRes: Placeholder card component for monitoring Bitcoin reserve balance and health status, currently displaying 'Not Available' messages with alerts noting that backend capabilities are not yet exposed.
frontend/src/components/reserve/BitcoinC: Collapsible card displaying a Python code snippet for querying Bitcoin Core RPC to check reserve balance, with warnings that this must be executed externally and includes copy-to-clipboard functionality.
frontend/src/components/reserve/External: Collapsible card containing a Python script example for monitoring mining pool earnings and automating reserve transfers, with alerts emphasizing external execution requirements and security warnings about API keys.
frontend/src/components/reserve/ReserveM: Configuration panel for managing multisig reserve settings (threshold, public keys, address, redeem script) with a warning alert that backend implementation is not yet complete.

Displays a collapsible card with Python code snippet for creating a Bitcoin Core multisig reserve address externally, including warnings that the code must be run outside the app since the Internet Computer cannot connect to localhost.
frontend/src/components/transfers/bestPr: Exports an array of best practice entries providing troubleshooting documentation for common issues like missing backend methods, HTTP outcall failures, localhost connectivity problems, and network configuration with detailed resolutions and workarounds.
frontend/src/components/transfers/BestPr: Provides a searchable, filterable best practices guide that auto-suggests relevant troubleshooting topics based on transfer failure patterns, error messages, and diagnostic data from failed Bitcoin transactions.
frontend/src/components/transfers/Broadc: Displays a collapsible alert explaining how Bitcoin transaction broadcasting works via IC HTTP outcalls to public blockchain APIs, with security warnings about never pasting private keys and clarifying that signing must be done externally.
frontend/src/components/transfers/Mainne: Shows an informational alert about mainnet Bitcoin transactions, highlighting that they are irreversible, fees are reserve-funded, confirmation times are typically 60 minutes, and Segwit addresses are supported.
frontend/src/components/transfers/Provid: Displays detailed diagnostics of blockchain provider broadcast attempts with collapsible logs for each provider, showing success/failure status, error messages, and response details for troubleshooting transaction broadcast issues.
frontend/src/components/transfers/Segwit: Renders a card showing Segwit transaction details including destination address, amount in sats/BTC, reserve-funded network fee, optional transaction hash, and copy-to-clipboard functionality with mainnet operation warnings.
frontend/src/components/transfers/Transa: Displays a progress card showing Bitcoin transaction confirmation status with a progress bar, estimated time remaining, transaction hash with blockchain explorer link, and different states for broadcast, confirming, and confirmed transactions.

Renders a status badge component that displays the current state of a transaction (failed, confirmed, broadcasting, signed, signing, or pending) based on signing status, broadcast status, and confirmation count with appropriate icons and colors.
frontend/src/components/transfers/Transf: Displays a table of transaction history with expandable rows showing detailed mainnet transaction information including signing/broadcast status, confirmation progress, and segwit address details for transactions that have blockchain-related metadata.
frontend/src/components/verification/Man: Form component for admins to manually record Bitcoin purchases by entering a transaction ID (64-char hex) and amount (BTC with up to 8 decimals), with validation and conversion to satoshis before calling the recordBitcoinPurchase mutation.
frontend/src/components/verification/Ver: Displays a table of verified Bitcoin purchases sorted by verification date, showing transaction ID with blockchain explorer link, amount in BTC, verification timestamp, and verifier principal with copy-to-clipboard functionality for IDs.
frontend/src/components/withdrawals/Admi: A table component for admins to view, sort, and filter withdrawal requests by status (pending/paid/rejected), with actions to approve, reject, or mark requests as paid.
Admin dashboard displaying withdrawal request statistics (pending/paid/rejected counts) and a table for managing requests, with manual payment processing workflow.
frontend/src/components/withdrawals/Exte: A collapsible informational component providing code examples and documentation for integrating external payout APIs like PayPal and Stripe.
frontend/src/components/withdrawals/With: Displays a user's withdrawal request history with filtering by status (all/pending/paid/rejected) in a tabbed card layout.
A summary card showing the user's withdrawal request counts by status with a link to request new withdrawals.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance with Internet Identity authentication, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAiReserveMonitorin: Hook for managing AI reserve monitoring preference in localStorage, defaulting to enabled and providing getter/setter for the toggle state.
frontend/src/hooks/useFundedWithdrawalNo: Hook that polls for withdrawal requests and displays toast notifications when requests are marked as paid, tracking notification state to avoid duplicates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, providing login/logout functionality, identity management, and authentication status tracking with support for delegation identity validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for data fetching and mutations including user profiles, transaction history, admin checks, balances, withdrawal requests, peer transfers, and Bitcoin purchases with automatic refetching for pending transactions.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes using OKLCH color space, defining a warm charcoal and amber color scheme with transaction status colors and financial UI component styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication context.
Admin page displaying administrator credentials including principal ID, account balance, and admin capabilities with copy-to-clipboard functionality.
frontend/src/pages/AdminManualVerificati: Admin page for manually recording Bitcoin purchases with a form and verification history table, primarily for historical tracking since instant funding is now the standard flow.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Main admin dashboard showing system overview with pending withdrawals count, transaction statistics, reserve status, and navigation cards to withdrawal management, peer transfers, manual verification, and credentials pages.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPeerTransfersPag: Admin page for viewing and monitoring all peer-to-peer credit transfers with filtering by status (pending, approved, rejected, deleted), displaying transfer details in a table with copy-to-clipboard functionality and summary statistics.
Admin page for directly crediting BTC to user accounts by Principal ID with validation for principal format and amount (up to 8 decimals), includes USD estimate display and transaction ID generation.
frontend/src/pages/AdminSendToUserPage.t: Admin page for sending BTC credits to users with searchable user list, user selection interface, amount validation, and confirmation dialog before executing peer credit transfers.
frontend/src/pages/AiLotteryPage.tsx: Page that generates AI-predicted lottery outcomes (3 spins with 5 main numbers and powerball) using historical data from data.ny.gov with fallback dataset, displaying confidence scores for each prediction.
frontend/src/pages/BuyBitcoinPage.tsx: Page for users to submit Bitcoin purchase transactions for instant account funding, displays current balance and purchase history with an instant funding form component.
frontend/src/pages/BuyCreditsPage.tsx: Placeholder page for future credit purchase feature showing current BTC balance and explaining the planned payment integration system with 1:1 reserve backing.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Main dashboard page displaying user's BTC balance, withdrawal status summary, and quick action cards for buying BTC, sending BTC, peer transfers, viewing history, and managing deposits. Includes a custodial wallet warning alert and uses funded withdrawal notifications.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Transaction history page showing all credit transactions and mainnet transfers with summary statistics (total transactions, credits received/spent, pending/completed mainnet transactions). Supports auto-opening specific transfer requests via session storage.
Displays approved peer-to-peer transfers received by the current user, showing sender information, amounts in BTC, timestamps, and copy-to-clipboard functionality for sender addresses.
Shows all peer-to-peer transfers sent by the current user with status badges (approved/pending/rejected), sorted by creation date, including recipient information and copy-to-clipboard functionality.
frontend/src/pages/PuzzleRewardsPage.tsx: Placeholder page for a puzzle rewards system feature that is not yet implemented in the backend, displaying an informational alert about future availability.
frontend/src/pages/SendBtcPage.tsx: Page for sending BTC to external Bitcoin addresses, currently showing a detailed alert that the backend sendBTC method is not implemented, with links to alternative features like withdrawal requests and peer transfers.
frontend/src/pages/SendToPeerPage.tsx: Page component for peer-to-peer credit transfers using principal IDs, with balance display, recipient validation, amount input, and confirmation dialog before sending.
frontend/src/pages/TransferTroubleshooti: Troubleshooting guide page explaining that the backend sendBTC method is not implemented, providing error diagnostics and implementation requirements for future Bitcoin mainnet transfers.
frontend/src/pages/WithdrawPage.tsx: Withdrawal request page allowing users to request PayPal/Stripe withdrawals with amount and account details, displays success confirmation and withdrawal history list.
frontend/src/types/mainnet.ts: TypeScript type definitions for mainnet Bitcoin transactions including signing/broadcast status, confirmation tracking, segwit address types, and diagnostic result interfaces.
frontend/src/utils/adminStatusCache.ts: localStorage-based cache utility for admin status verification with 5-minute TTL and per-session tracking to ensure fresh checks on new page loads.
frontend/src/utils/errors.ts: Error normalization utility that converts various sendBTC and blockchain API errors into user-friendly messages, handling backend unavailability, network issues, rate limits, and address validation failures.
frontend/src/utils/fundedNotificationSto: Per-principal localStorage store tracking which withdrawal request IDs have been notified as PAID to prevent duplicate notifications, with baseline initialization support.
frontend/src/utils/transactionStatus.ts: Utility functions for Bitcoin transaction status management including pending state detection, status message formatting, confirmation time estimation, Segwit address validation, and amount formatting.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: URL parameter parsing utilities supporting both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence for maintaining state like admin tokens across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, extended typography, container queries, animations, and financial-themed design tokens.
project_state.json: Project state tracking document showing a Bitcoin wallet application with pending implementation of transaction sending functionality including buildTransaction and getTxId helper functions for testnet/mainnet support.
